name: FlashDevelop ActionScript 2 Project File
summary: Learn about .AS2PROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ActionScript 2 projects can be created by choosing Project â†’ New Project in the software. The AS2PROJ file and the other project files and directories are saved to the directory that you specify in the New Project window that appears.

description: Project file created by FlashDevelop, an free and open source development IDE commonly used for Flash programming; saved in an XML format and contains build settings, references to project source code files, and output .SWF options.
